revised_title: Magnetic Qualities of Nickel: Supplementary Paper
tldr: This paper is a supplement to a previous work by Ewing and Cowan, focusing on the effects of longitudinal compression on the magnetic permeability and retentiveness of nickel. The author and his students conducted experiments using a nickel bar under various levels of stress and magnetizing forces, resulting in curves that show the relationship between the intensity of magnetization, residual magnetism, and magnetic permeability.
